Package org.eclipse.ui.views.navigator

Provides the standard Resource Navigator view which presents the tree of resources in the workspace.
This package is deprecated as of release 3.5, use the Common Navigator Framework instead.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IResourceNavigator Deprecated.
    as of 3.5, use the Common Navigator Framework classes instead
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description

    as of 3.5, use the Common Navigator Framework classes instead
